title: Armor
description: Navigate all the armor pieces available in Japanese versions of Monster Hunter and Monster Hunter G.
head: <link rel='stylesheet' href='css/armor.css'/><script type='text/javascript' src='js/toggle_full_details.js'></script><script type='text/javascript' src='js/armor.js'></script>
subtitle: Names adjusted based on best guesses from the Gamefaqs MH1 weapon trees and MHF1 wiki weapons pages. Some weapons may not be obtainable through normal play. Most prices are for forging; a price in parentheses is the cost to buy.
